    Megatron marched down the corridor, with Kitkat on his scopes. She had 
just exited the meeting with Apocolypse, and he wanted answers. Most of all, 
he wanted to know who she thought she was, sneaking around like this.
    "Kitkat, I want to talk with you. NOW. Thats right, now." He demanded and 
pointed back into the conference room.
